example.description: Enables monitoring of all metrics for the group named 'my-test-asg'.

Enables monitoring of all metrics for the group identified by the ARN 'arn:aws:autoscaling:us-east-1:123456789012:autoScalingGroup:5d1ee7f3-f0f6-42bd-851e-0513f88c56b0:autoScalingGroupName/my-test-asg'.
Enables monitoring of the metrics 'GroupMinSize' and 'GroupMaxSize' for the group named 'my-test-asg'.
